name: unironed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Unironed clothes have not been ironed (= made flat and smooth using a piece of equipment called an iron, that has a handle and a flat base and is usually heated with electricity): She was dressed casually in an unironed blouse and jeans. His shirt was unironed and his jacket covered with dust. Synonym
unpressed
More examplesFewer examplesMy dad never once wore jeans, or an unironed shirt.She felt ashamed that the children's school uniforms were unironed and dirty.There were piles of unironed clothing lying around.
